verses.verse: The sons<WH1121> of Judah:<WH3063> Perez,<WH6557> Hezron,<WH2696> and Carmi,<WH3756> and Hur,<WH2354> and Shobal.<WH7732>

Reaiah<WH7211> the son<WH1121> of Shobal<WH7732> became the father<WH3205> of Jahath;<WH3189> and Jahath<WH3189> became the father<WH3205> of Ahumai<WH267> and Lahad.<WH3855> These are the families<WH4940> of the Zorathites.<WH6882>
These were the sons of the father<WH1> of Etam:<WH5862> Jezreel,<WH3157> and Ishma,<WH3457> and Idbash;<WH3031> and the name<WH8034> of their sister<WH269> was Hazzelelponi;<WH6753>

and Penuel<WH6439> the father<WH1> of Gedor,<WH1446> and Ezer<WH5829> the father<WH1> of Hushah.<WH2364> These are the sons<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> the firstborn<WH1060> of Ephrathah,<WH672> the father<WH1> of Bethlehem.<WH1035>
Ashhur<WH806> the father<WH1> of Tekoa<WH8620> had two<WH8147> wives,<WH802> Helah<WH2458> and Naarah.<WH5292>
Naarah<WH5292> bore<WH3205> him Ahuzzam,<WH275> and Hepher,<WH2660> and Temeni,<WH8488> and Haahashtari.<WH326> These were the sons<WH1121> of Naarah.<WH5292>
The sons<WH1121> of Helah<WH2458> were Zereth,<WH6889> Izhar,<WH6714> and Ethnan.<WH869>
Hakkoz<WH6976> became the father<WH3205> of Anub,<WH6036> and Zobebah,<WH6637> and the families<WH4940> of Aharhel<WH316> the son<WH1121> of Harum.<WH2037>
Jabez<WH3258> was more honorable<WH3513> than his brothers:<WH251> and his mother<WH517> named<WH8034> him<WH7121> Jabez,<WH3258> saying,<WH559> "Because I bore<WH3205> him with sorrow.<WH6090>"

Jabez<WH3258> called<WH7121> on the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "Oh that<WH518> you would bless<WH1288> me indeed,<WH1288> and enlarge<WH7235> my border,<WH1366> and that your hand<WH3027> might be with me,<WH6213> and that you would keep me from evil,<WH7451> that it not be to my sorrow!<WH6087>" God<WH430> granted<WH935> him that which he requested.<WH7592>
Chelub<WH3620> the brother<WH251> of Shuhah<WH7746> became the father<WH3205> of Mehir,<WH4243> who was the father<WH1> of Eshton.<WH850>
Eshton<WH850> became the father<WH3205> of Beth Rapha,<WH1051> and Paseah,<WH6454> and Tehinnah<WH8468> the father<WH1> of Ir Nahash.<WH5904> These are the men<WH582> of Recah.<WH7397>
The sons<WH1121> of Kenaz:<WH7073> Othniel,<WH6274> and Seraiah.<WH8304> The sons<WH1121> of Othniel:<WH6274> Hathath.<WH2867>

Meonothai<WH4587> became the father<WH3205> of Ophrah:<WH6084> and Seraiah<WH8304> became the father<WH3205> of Joab<WH3097> the father<WH1> of Ge<WH1516> Harashim;<WH2798> for they were craftsmen.<WH2791>
The sons<WH1121> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh:<WH3312> Iru,<WH5900> Elah,<WH425> and Naam;<WH5277> and the sons<WH1121> of Elah;<WH425> and Kenaz.<WH7073>
The sons<WH1121> of Jehallelel:<WH3094> Ziph,<WH2128> and Ziphah,<WH2129> Tiria,<WH8493> and Asarel.<WH840>

The sons<WH1121> of Ezrah:<WH5834> Jether,<WH3500> and Mered,<WH4778> and Epher,<WH6081> and Jalon;<WH3210> and she bore<WH2029> Miriam,<WH4813> and Shammai,<WH8060> and Ishbah<WH3431> the father<WH1> of Eshtemoa.<WH851>

His wife<WH802> the Jewess<WH3057> bore<WH3205> Jered<WH3382> the father<WH1> of Gedor,<WH1446> and Heber<WH2268> the father<WH1> of Soco,<WH7755> and Jekuthiel<WH3354> the father<WH1> of Zanoah.<WH2182> These are the sons<WH1121> of Bithiah<WH1332> the daughter<WH1323> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> whom Mered<WH4778> took.<WH3947>
The sons<WH1121> of the wife<WH802> of Hodiah,<WH1940> the sister<WH269> of Naham,<WH5163> were the father<WH1> of Keilah<WH7084> the Garmite,<WH1636> and Eshtemoa<WH851> the Maacathite.<WH4602>
The sons<WH1121> of Shimon:<WH7889> Amnon,<WH550> and Rinnah,<WH7441> Ben Hanan,<WH1135> and Tilon.<WH8436> The sons<WH1121> of Ishi:<WH3469> Zoheth,<WH2105> and Ben Zoheth.<WH2105>

The sons<WH1121> of Shelah<WH7956> the son<WH1121> of Judah:<WH3063> Er<WH6147> the father<WH1> of Lecah,<WH3922> and Laadah<WH3935> the father<WH1> of Mareshah,<WH4762> and the families<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of those who worked<WH5656> fine linen,<WH948> of the house<WH1004> of Ashbea;<WH791>

and Jokim,<WH3137> and the men<WH582> of Cozeba,<WH3578> and Joash,<WH3101> and Saraph,<WH8315> who had dominion<WH1166> in Moab,<WH4124> and Jashubilehem.<WH3433> The records<WH1697> are ancient.<WH6267>
These were the potters,<WH3335> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Netaim<WH5196> and Gederah:<WH1448> there they lived<WH3427> with the king<WH4428> for his work.<WH4399>
The sons<WH1121> of Simeon:<WH8095> Nemuel,<WH5241> and Jamin,<WH3226> Jarib,<WH3402> Zerah,<WH2226> Shaul;<WH7586>
Shallum<WH7967> his son,<WH1121> Mibsam<WH4017> his son,<WH1121> Mishma<WH4927> his son.<WH1121>
The sons<WH1121> of Mishma:<WH4927> Hammuel<WH2536> his son,<WH1121> Zaccur<WH2139> his son,<WH1121> Shimei<WH8096> his son.<WH1121>

Shimei<WH8096> had sixteen<WH8337> sons<WH1121> and six<WH8337> daughters;<WH1323> but his brothers<WH251> didn't<WH7227> have many children,<WH1121> neither did all their family<WH4940> multiply<WH7235> like the children<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
They lived<WH3427> at Beersheba,<WH884> and Moladah,<WH4137> and Hazarshual,<WH2705>
and at Bilhah,<WH1090> and at Ezem,<WH6107> and at Tolad,<WH8434>
and at Bethuel,<WH1328> and at Hormah,<WH2767> and at Ziklag,<WH6860>
and at Beth Marcaboth,<WH1024> and Hazar Susim,<WH2702> and at Beth Biri,<WH1011> and at Shaaraim.<WH8189> These were their cities<WH5892> to the reign<WH4427> of David.<WH1732>
Their villages<WH2691> were Etam,<WH5862> and Ain,<WH5871> Rimmon,<WH7417> and Tochen,<WH8507> and Ashan,<WH6228> five<WH2568> cities;<WH5892>
and all their villages<WH2691> that were around<WH5439> the same cities,<WH5892> to Baal.<WH1168> These were their habitations,<WH4186> and they have their genealogy.<WH3187>
Meshobab,<WH4877> and Jamlech,<WH3230> and Joshah<WH3144> the son<WH1121> of Amaziah,<WH558>
and Joel,<WH3100> and Jehu<WH3058> the son<WH1121> of Joshibiah,<WH3143> the son<WH1121> of Seraiah,<WH8304> the son<WH1121> of Asiel,<WH6221>
and Elioenai,<WH454> and Jaakobah,<WH3291> and Jeshohaiah,<WH3439> and Asaiah,<WH6222> and Adiel,<WH5717> and Jesimiel,<WH3450> and Benaiah,<WH1141>
and Ziza<WH2124> the son<WH1121> of Shiphi,<WH8230> the son<WH1121> of Allon,<WH438> the son<WH1121> of Jedaiah,<WH3042> the son<WH1121> of Shimri,<WH8113> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah<WH8098>â€”
these mentioned<WH935> by name<WH8034> were princes<WH5387> in their families:<WH4940> and their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004> increased<WH6555> greatly.<WH7230>
They went<WH3212> to the entrance<WH3996> of Gedor,<WH1446> even to the east side<WH4217> of the valley,<WH1516> to seek<WH1245> pasture<WH4829> for their flocks.<WH6629>

They found<WH4672> fat<WH8082> pasture<WH4829> and good,<WH2896> and the land<WH776> was wide,<WH7342> and quiet,<WH8252> and peaceable;<WH7961> for those who lived<WH3427> there before<WH6440> were of Ham.<WH2526>

These written<WH3789> by name<WH8034> came<WH935> in the days<WH3117> of Hezekiah<WH3169> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and struck<WH5221> their tents,<WH168> and the Meunim<WH4583> who were found<WH4672> there,<WH2763> and destroyed them utterly to this day,<WH3117> and lived<WH3427> in their place;<WH4829> because there was pasture there for their flocks.<WH6629>

Some of them,<WH1121> even of the sons of Simeon,<WH8095> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> men,<WH582> went<WH1980> to Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> having for their captains<WH7218> Pelatiah,<WH6410> and Neariah,<WH5294> and Rephaiah,<WH7509> and Uzziel,<WH5816> the sons<WH1121> of Ishi.<WH3469>
They struck<WH5221> the remnant<WH7611> of the Amalekites<WH6002> who escaped,<WH6413> and have lived<WH3427> there to this day.<WH3117>
